comment.author: 8256808@N02
comment._content: Forgive the self-linking, but this is what the block looked like earlier this year. Note how one of the buildings in the middle lost a couple stories in the interim.

comment.author: 8059992@N08
comment._content: This whole Changing New York is very interesting set, but the most intresting parts really are the ones that have some modern image to compare, like in this particular picture. ´Cause you know, then you can really see the change of what has happened to the city and that´s what makes the old pictures even more fantastic. Pardon my language, I´m Finnish:)
